name: The Crunchy Pirates Of The Milky Seas
name_original: The Crunchy Pirates Of The Milky Seas
description:
a pirate ship firefight in a bowl of cereal

use A and D to move and space to shoot

enemies will appear on screen, you can only shoot as many cannonballs as there are enemies 

over time a higher amount of enemies will come at once

the goal is to get the highest score (1 ship= +1score)
